name: CUSTOM BUSINESS CARD THANK YOU NOTES - Set of 30
description:
What better way to show your appreciation to your customers and promote your shop than with these Business Thank You Cards customized just for you and your shop!

This set of 30 cards are made with double sided heavyweight cardstock. The front is embellished with a circle pop out containing a “Thank You” image. On the inside of the card are slits to tuck your business card and room to write a personal message. The inside and outside edges of the cards and circle pop out are chalked in a coordinating color for that finishing touch. Many color options available to compliment your paper choice. 

These cards measure approximately 4" x 2.5" folded and the set is sealed in a clear plastic sleeve for protection.

In "Notes to Merchant" please let me know your thoughts on colors and themes so I can find the perfect paper match for you and your shop!

Please select below one of the following standard “Thank You” images from picture #3 to use as your Business Thank You Card greeting. Please note images are “as is” and will NOT contain your logo or shop name. Image choice & color may be changed before production of cards to better coordinate with paper selection.

You may select to use your own logo as your business thank you card greeting. If you would like to use your own logo, please select one of two options... 1) If you are purchasing this listing for the first time, you will need to select option "F" for Custom Logo Image Conversion. This ONE TIME purchase of $5 will allow me to format your logo to fit and match your custom cards. Once you have purchased it for your initial order, you will NOT need to purchase it again. I will keep the file and use it again for your reorders. 2) Returning customers, please select option "G". In "Notes to Merchant" please let me know if we will be recreating your original design on the same paper or if you would like new paper samples sent. If you would like new paper samples, please let me know your thoughts on colors and pattern themes so I can find the perfect paper match for you and your shop!

Please note I am NOT a graphic artist. This listing is not for logo editing or creation. It is strictly formatting and resizing. Image files must be in standard formats (ex. JPEG, BMP, GIF, TIFF, PNG) and have a transparent background. PSD and PDF files are also acceptable. Please email them to info@mypocketfulofsunshine.com within 24 hrs of purchasing this listing.

You will receive a proof of your formatted logo to approve before printing.

Please feel free to contact me with any questions you may have regarding this listing before purchasing.

*Please note that the “Thank You So Much” Sun Image is my custom logo and is not available for purchase. All other images shown are examples of past custom orders.

All cards are hand stamped on the back with my logo.

THANK YOU for shopping at Pocketful of Sunshine! 

Please Note: Colors may differ slightly due to photograph quality.

*All items are made in a smoke free, pet friendly home. Pets are kept away from all supplies and finished products.

name: CUSTOM 2 INCH CIRCLE TAGS - Set of 25
description:
What better way to brand your product and promote your shop than with these circle tags customized just for you and your shop!

This set of 25 circle tags are made with double sided heavyweight cardstock. The front is embellished with your printed logo and the edges are chalked in a coordinating color for that finishing touch. The back of the tags may be left blank for your own personal message or may be printed on with your own customized message such as product care instructions, coupon codes, product ingredients, thank you message, etc.

These circle tags measure approximately 2" in diameter and the set is sealed in a clear plastic sleeve for protection.

If you are purchasing this listing for the first time, you will need to select either the single or double sided option with logo conversion. This ONE TIME purchase of $5 will allow me to format your logo/text to fit and match your custom circle tags. Once you have purchased it for your initial order, you will NOT need to purchase it again. I will keep the file and use it again for your reorders.

Please note I am NOT a graphic artist. This listing is not for logo editing or creation. It is strictly formatting and resizing. Image files must be in standard formats (ex. JPEG, BMP, GIF, TIFF, PNG) and have a transparent background. PSD and PDF files are also acceptable. Please email them to info@mypocketfulofsunshine.com within 24 hrs of purchasing this listing.

You will receive a proof of your formatted logo/text to approve before printing.

In "Notes to Merchant", please let me know your thoughts on colors and pattern themes so I can find the perfect paper match for you and your shop! You will receive paper samples to review and select from before production.

Returning customers, please select below your choice of printing options (single sided or double sided) and in "Notes to Merchant" please let me know if we will be recreating your original design on the same paper or if you would like new paper samples sent. If you would like new paper samples, please let me know your thoughts on colors and pattern themes so I can find the perfect paper match for you and your shop!

Please feel free to contact me with any questions you may have regarding this listing before purchasing.

THANK YOU for shopping at Pocketful of Sunshine!

Please Note: Colors may differ slightly due to photograph quality.

*All items are made in a smoke free, pet friendly home. Pets are kept away from all supplies and finished products.

name: CUSTOM STATIONARY BAG OF CARDS - Set of 15 **FREE US SHIPPING**
description:
This unbelievably cute bag of stationary includes 15 cards and 15 white envelopes. Each stationary card measures approximately 4.25" x 5. 5" folded. Each card is created from a white cardstock layered with a colored textured cardstock, coordinating patterned paper and is embellished with a two layered pop out monogram made from textured cardstock. The inside of each card is matted in a coordinating color cardstock and is blank for your own personal message. The entire set is packaged in an adorable matching gift bag… perfect for presenting that special someone with their special gift! The gift bag measures approximately 6.5" x 3" x 9" assembled.

A lovely set for....

• teachers
• family 
• friends 
• coworkers 

Please select below from one of the following patterned papers from pictures #2 and #3 to use as your stationary set design and in "Notes to Merchant" please let me know your letter choice for the monogram.

You may also select to have another patterned paper design if none of the shown papers capture your heart. If you would like to have me find that perfect paper for you, please select option "J" and in "Notes to Merchant" please let me know your thoughts on colors and themes.

Please feel free to contact me with any questions you may have regarding this listing before purchasing.

All cards are hand stamped on the back with my logo.

THANK YOU for shopping at Pocketful of Sunshine!

Please Note: Colors may differ slightly due to photograph quality.

*All items are made in a smoke free, pet friendly home. Pets are kept away from all supplies and finished products.

**FREE SHIPPING for US Customers**
